Reviews.Content: triple gorgeous hallway double wardrobe double bedroom lounge 2 sofas spare beds bathroom jacuzzi bath huge garden furniture decor cleanliness exceptional hotel staff friendly helped parking little question answered stright hotel run shuttle bus city centre dont worry trains metro system breakfast delivered scrambled eggs cooked ham variety cold meats cheese cereal cakes bread jam etc coffee machine waiter proper espresso cappuccino

Reviews.Title: “Quiet hotel with very helpful staff, great breakfast - only slight problem our room was in basement.”

Reviews.Content: clean elegant hotel exactly advertised walked north train station train rome day arrives piazza popolo near spanish steps metro visit downtown rome hilly fit bit tiring time getting rome staff helpful friendly breakfast day wished
